name: JetTasks
shortDescription: A sample list app to demonstrate Modern Android Development Best Practices using MVVM,Jetpack Compose, Jetpack Navigation,Kotlin Flow, Kotlin Coroutines, Room, Jetpack (Proto)DataStore and Hilt.
longDescription: A sample list app to demonstrate Modern Android Development Best Practices using MVVM,Jetpack Compose, Jetpack Navigation,Kotlin Flow, Kotlin Coroutines, Room, Jetpack (Proto)DataStore and Hilt.
